Package ball.maven.plugins.javadoc

ball-javadoc-maven-plugin Mojos.

dev.hcf.ball:ball-javadoc-maven-plugin

Javadoc Maven Plugin

GoalPhaseDescription
generate-javadoc-map

org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo to generate offline javadoc map. For each documented package, generate the following key/value pairs: package/Javadoc Root URL, package-module / Module (e.g., java.base), and package-artifact / groupId:artifactId. The package-module and package-artifact key/values are absent if no module or artifact respectively are specified. {@injected.fields} {@maven.plugin.fields} {@bean.info}

generate-options-filegenerate-sources

org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo to generate javadoc options file for maven-javadoc-plugin. {@injected.fields} {@maven.plugin.fields} {@bean.info}

help

Display help information on ball-javadoc-maven-plugin. Call mvn ball-javadoc:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

Author:
Allen D. Ball
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractJavadocMojo
    Abstract base class for javadoc Mojos.
    GenerateJavadocMapMojo
    Mojo to generate offline javadoc map.
    GenerateOptionsFileMojo
    Mojo to generate javadoc options file for maven-javadoc-plugin.
    Link
    <link/> parameter.
    Offlinelink
    <offlinelink/> parameter.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Retain
    Annotation to prevent javac from discarding package-info.class.
